Service Details: - Offers a regional, nonprofit opera company and training centre for young, promising classical artists- Dedicated to helping equip the next generation in discovery of the most compelling vocal works, both past and present- Performing season focused on one full mainstage opera each year and several smaller operatic productions- Offers Young Artist vocal education and outreach programs, in-class opera productions and school tours
